name: NO SPACE JUMP
description:
No Space Jump  is a platformer where you can't control your jump. You automatically bounce up and down uncontrollably.

Gameplay:

  • Enter the portal to progress
  • Don't touch the bullets or spikes!
  • Touching an enemy will obliterate them, but you don't earn any points for violence

Controls:

  • [LEFT] and [RIGH]T arrow keys to move
  • [R] to reset level (when you die)
  • [SPACEBAR] to start the game
  • [T] if you want to cheat and skip to the next level... (but why would you?)
